thread.title: BRIEF-Endo Obtains Preliminary Injunction Against Quva Pharma Preventing Marketing And Release Of Vasopressin Product

title: BRIEF-Endo Obtains Preliminary Injunction Against Quva Pharma Preventing Marketing And Release Of Vasopressin Product

organizations.name: brief-endo obtains preliminary injunction against quva pharma preventing marketing
quva pharma preventing marketing and release of vasopressin product reuters

text:
March 1 (Reuters) - Endo International Plc:
* ENDO OBTAINS PRELIMINARY INJUNCTION AGAINST QUVA PHARMA, INC. PREVENTING MARKETING AND RELEASE OF VASOPRESSIN PRODUCT
* ‍PRELIMINARY INJUNCTION ISSUED TODAY IS EFFECTIVE THROUGH CONCLUSION OF A TRIAL, WHICH HAS NOT YET BEEN SCHEDULED​ Source text for Eikon:
